title: Figures
text:
Packages

library(bulkreadr)
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
library(metafor)
library(psych)
library(cowplot)
library(patchwork)
library(r4pde)
library(broom)
library(metafor)
library(lme4)
library(writexl)
library(gsheet)
library(readxl)



Importation

lsd_2021 <- read_csv("lsd2021.csv")
lsd_2022 <- read_csv("lsd2022.csv")
lsd_2023 <- read_csv("lsd2023.csv")
lsd_2024 <- read_csv("lsd2024.csv")

lsd_combined <- rbind(lsd_2021, lsd_2022, lsd_2023, lsd_2024)

lsd_combined <- lsd_combined |>
  separate(LOCAL_YEAR, into = c("local", "year"), sep = "_", remove = FALSE)

lsd_combined$trial <- as.integer(factor(lsd_combined$LOCAL_YEAR, levels = unique(lsd_combined$LOCAL_YEAR)))

lsd_combined <- lsd_combined |> 
  select(LOCAL_YEAR, trial, year, local, trat, sev, yld)

lsd_combined_mean <- lsd_combined |> 
  group_by(trat, trial, year, local) |> 
  summarise(mean_sev = mean(sev),
            mean_yld = mean(yld))


r_regression = lsd_combined %>%
  filter(sev != "NA") %>%
  filter(!yld == "NA") %>%
 # group_by(year) %>%
  dplyr::select( sev, yld, LOCAL_YEAR) %>%
  #group_by(study) %>%
  do({
    model <- lm(.$yld ~ .$sev + factor(.$LOCAL_YEAR))
    tidy_model <- tidy(model)
    confint_model <- confint(model)  # Calcula os intervalos de confiança
    bind_cols(tidy_model, confint_model)
  })


r_regression

# A tibble: 40 × 7
   term                   estimate std.error statistic  p.value `2.5 %` `97.5 %`
   <chr>                     <dbl>     <dbl>     <dbl>    <dbl>   <dbl>    <dbl>
 1 (Intercept)             4754.      53.5     88.9    0         4649.    4859. 
 2 .$sev                    -15.8      0.825  -19.1    4.29e-74   -17.4    -14.2
 3 factor(.$LOCAL_YEAR)1…   682.      75.6      9.02   4.77e-19   534.     830. 
 4 factor(.$LOCAL_YEAR)1…   977.      68.8     14.2    2.17e-43   842.    1112. 
 5 factor(.$LOCAL_YEAR)1…  -342.      74.0     -4.63   3.98e- 6  -487.    -197. 
 6 factor(.$LOCAL_YEAR)1…  -478.      68.8     -6.94   5.42e-12  -613.    -343. 
 7 factor(.$LOCAL_YEAR)1…   392.      73.8      5.30   1.28e- 7   247.     536. 
 8 factor(.$LOCAL_YEAR)1…     1.80    75.9      0.0237 9.81e- 1  -147.     151. 
 9 factor(.$LOCAL_YEAR)1…  -941.      66.8    -14.1    1.17e-42 -1072.    -810. 
10 factor(.$LOCAL_YEAR)1…  -501.      73.5     -6.82   1.25e-11  -645.    -357. 
# ℹ 30 more rows

r_regression <- r_regression |> 
filter(term %in% c("(Intercept)",".$sev"))
 
r_regression[r_regression$term== "(Intercept)",c("parameters")] <- "Intercept"
r_regression[r_regression$term== ".$sev",c("parameters")] <- "Slope"

i <- 1
 while (i <= nrow(r_regression)) {
  if (r_regression$parameters[i] == "Slope" && r_regression$estimate[i] > 0) {
    # Remove a linha do Slope e a linha do Intercept correspondente
    r_regression <- r_regression[-c(i, i - 1), ]
    # Atualiza o índice, pois duas linhas foram removidas
    i <- i - 2
  }
  i <- i + 1
  }
r_regression

# A tibble: 2 × 8
  term        estimate std.error statistic  p.value `2.5 %` `97.5 %` parameters
  <chr>          <dbl>     <dbl>     <dbl>    <dbl>   <dbl>    <dbl> <chr>     
1 (Intercept)   4754.     53.5        88.9 0         4649.    4859.  Intercept 
2 .$sev          -15.8     0.825     -19.1 4.29e-74   -17.4    -14.2 Slope     



r_regression = r_regression |> 
filter(term %in% c("(Intercept)",".$sev"))
 
r_regression[r_regression$term== "(Intercept)",c("parameters")] <- "Intercept"
r_regression[r_regression$term== ".$sev",c("parameters")] <- "Slope"

i <- 1
 while (i <= nrow(r_regression)) {
  if (r_regression$parameters[i] == "Slope" && r_regression$estimate[i] > 0) {
    # Remove a linha do Slope e a linha do Intercept correspondente
    r_regression <- r_regression[-c(i, i - 1), ]
    # Atualiza o índice, pois duas linhas foram removidas
    i <- i - 2
  }
  i <- i + 1
  }
r_regression

# A tibble: 2 × 8
  term        estimate std.error statistic  p.value `2.5 %` `97.5 %` parameters
  <chr>          <dbl>     <dbl>     <dbl>    <dbl>   <dbl>    <dbl> <chr>     
1 (Intercept)   4754.     53.5        88.9 0         4649.    4859.  Intercept 
2 .$sev          -15.8     0.825     -19.1 4.29e-74   -17.4    -14.2 Slope     



colnames(r_regression) = c("term", "estimate", "std.error", "statistic", "p.value", "low", "high", "parameters")

r_regression = r_regression |> 
filter(term %in% c("(Intercept)",".$sev"))
r_regression$pil <- c(3074.0281, -43.8480)
r_regression$piu <- c(6104.0960, -1.3186)


lsd_combined |> 
 ggplot(aes(sev, yld)) +
  geom_point(color = "NA")+
  scale_y_continuous(breaks = c(0, 1000, 2000, 3000, 4000, 5000, 6000, 7000), 
                     limits = c(2000, 7000))+
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = c(0, 25, 50, 75, 100),
                     limits = c(0, 100))+
  geom_abline(data =r_regression, aes(slope = estimate[2], intercept = estimate[1]), size = 1.5, color = "black")+
  geom_abline(data = r_regression, aes(intercept = high[1], slope = high[2]), size = .51, linetype = 2)+ #upper ci
  geom_abline(data = r_regression, aes(intercept = low[1], slope = low[2]), size = .51, linetype = 2)+ #low ci
  geom_abline(data = r_regression, aes(intercept = piu[1], slope = piu[2]), size = 2, linetype = 2, color = "darkgray")+ #upper pi
  geom_abline(data = r_regression, aes(intercept = pil[1], slope = pil[2]), size = 2, linetype = 2, color = "darkgray")+ #low pi
  labs(x = "LSD Severity (%)", y = "Yield (kg/ha) ")+
  theme_classic()+
  theme(text = element_text(size = 20),
        axis.text.x = element_text(size = 18),   
        axis.text.y = element_text(size = 18))









r_regression2 = lsd_combined |>
  filter(sev != "NA") |>
  filter(!yld == "NA")  |>
  dplyr::select(sev, yld, trial) |>
  group_by(trial) |>
  do({
    model <- lm(.$yld ~ .$sev)
    tidy_model <- tidy(model)
    confint_model <- confint(model)  
    bind_cols(tidy_model, confint_model)
  })

r_regression2

# A tibble: 78 × 8
# Groups:   trial [39]
   trial term        estimate std.error statistic  p.value `2.5 %` `97.5 %`
   <int> <chr>          <dbl>     <dbl>     <dbl>    <dbl>   <dbl>    <dbl>
 1     1 (Intercept)  4386.       68.8      63.8  1.96e-43  4247.   4525.  
 2     1 .$sev          -5.95      5.54     -1.07 2.89e- 1   -17.1     5.22
 3     2 (Intercept)  4348.       39.7     110.   3.05e-53  4268.   4428.  
 4     2 .$sev         -81.6      23.7      -3.44 1.32e- 3  -129.    -33.7 
 5     3 (Intercept)  4347.      118.       36.8  1.33e-33  4109.   4585.  
 6     3 .$sev         -13.3       3.88     -3.44 1.34e- 3   -21.2    -5.50
 7     4 (Intercept)  4741.      245.       19.3  1.55e-22  4247.   5236.  
 8     4 .$sev         -29.8       8.98     -3.33 1.84e- 3   -48.0   -11.7 
 9     5 (Intercept)  4567.      203.       22.5  4.46e-25  4158.   4976.  
10     5 .$sev         -28.7       7.46     -3.85 3.97e- 4   -43.8   -13.7 
# ℹ 68 more rows



r_regression2 = r_regression2 |> 
filter(term %in% c("(Intercept)",".$sev"))
 
r_regression2[r_regression2$term== "(Intercept)",c("parameters")] <- "Intercept"
r_regression2[r_regression2$term== ".$sev",c("parameters")] <- "Slope"

i <- 1
 while (i <= nrow(r_regression2)) {
  if (r_regression2$parameters[i] == "Slope" && r_regression2$estimate[i] > 0) {
    r_regression2 <- r_regression2[-c(i, i - 1), ]
    i <- i - 2
  }
  i <- i + 1
  }
r_regression2

# A tibble: 76 × 9
# Groups:   trial [38]
   trial term  estimate std.error statistic  p.value `2.5 %` `97.5 %` parameters
   <int> <chr>    <dbl>     <dbl>     <dbl>    <dbl>   <dbl>    <dbl> <chr>     
 1     1 (Int…  4386.       68.8      63.8  1.96e-43  4247.   4525.   Intercept 
 2     1 .$sev    -5.95      5.54     -1.07 2.89e- 1   -17.1     5.22 Slope     
 3     2 (Int…  4348.       39.7     110.   3.05e-53  4268.   4428.   Intercept 
 4     2 .$sev   -81.6      23.7      -3.44 1.32e- 3  -129.    -33.7  Slope     
 5     3 (Int…  4347.      118.       36.8  1.33e-33  4109.   4585.   Intercept 
 6     3 .$sev   -13.3       3.88     -3.44 1.34e- 3   -21.2    -5.50 Slope     
 7     4 (Int…  4741.      245.       19.3  1.55e-22  4247.   5236.   Intercept 
 8     4 .$sev   -29.8       8.98     -3.33 1.84e- 3   -48.0   -11.7  Slope     
 9     5 (Int…  4567.      203.       22.5  4.46e-25  4158.   4976.   Intercept 
10     5 .$sev   -28.7       7.46     -3.85 3.97e- 4   -43.8   -13.7  Slope     
# ℹ 66 more rows



slope_coefficient = r_regression2 |> 
  filter(parameters == "Slope") |> 
  group_by(trial) |> 
  summarise(
    Slope = estimate
  )

slope_coefficient[,1] = NULL

slope_coefficient |> 
  filter(!Slope == "NA") |> 
  summarise(
mean = mean(Slope))

# A tibble: 1 × 1
   mean
  <dbl>
1 -24.7

intercept_coefficient = r_regression2 |> 
  filter(parameters == "Intercept") |>
  group_by(trial) |> 
  summarise(
    Intercept = estimate
  )
intercept_coefficient[,1] = NULL

mean(intercept_coefficient$Intercept)

[1] 4608.184

sd(intercept_coefficient$Intercept)

[1] 793.1929

regression = cbind(slope_coefficient,intercept_coefficient)


ggplot() +
  geom_point(aes(x = 0:100, y = seq(0,7000,by = 70)), color = NA)+
   scale_y_continuous(breaks = c(0, 1000,2000,3000, 4000,5000,6000,7000), 
                     limits = c(0, 7000))+
  geom_abline(data =regression, aes(slope = Slope, intercept = Intercept), size = 1,
              alpha = 0.5, color = "gray")+
  geom_abline(intercept = 4754.14525    ,slope = -15.78117  , size = 1.2)+
  geom_abline(intercept = 4859.08129,slope = -14.16354 , size = .51, linetype = 2)+
  geom_abline(intercept = 4649.2092 ,slope = -17.3988, size = .51, linetype = 2)+
  labs(x = "LSD Severity (%)", y = "Yield (kg/ha) ")+
  theme_classic()







ggplot() +
  geom_point(aes(x = 0:100, y = seq(0,7000,by = 70)), color = NA)+
   scale_y_continuous(breaks = c(0, 1000,2000,3000, 4000,5000,6000,7000), 
                     limits = c(0, 7000))+
  geom_abline(data =regression, aes(slope = Slope, intercept = Intercept), size = 1, alpha = 0.5, color = "gray")+
  labs(x = "LSD Severity (%)", y = "Yield (kg/ha) ")+
  theme_classic()+
  theme(text = element_text(size = 20),
        axis.text.x = element_text(size = 18),   
        axis.text.y = element_text(size = 18))









lsd_combined_mean |> 
  ggplot(aes(mean_sev, mean_yld)) +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = FALSE, color = "black", fullrange = TRUE) +
  geom_point(color = "black", shape = 1) +
  facet_wrap(~trial,
             ncol = 5) +
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(0, 6000)) +
  scale_x_continuous(limits = c(0, 100)) +
  theme_cowplot() +
  labs(y = "Yield (kg/ha)", x = "Severity (%)")

title: Data
text:
Packages

library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
library(cowplot)
library(patchwork)
library(gsheet)



Importation

lsd_2021 <- read_csv("lsd2021.csv")
lsd_2022 <- read_csv("lsd2022.csv")
lsd_2023 <- read_csv("lsd2023.csv")
lsd_2024 <- read_csv("lsd2024.csv")

lsd_combined <- rbind(lsd_2021, lsd_2022, lsd_2023, lsd_2024)

lsd_combined <- lsd_combined |>
  separate(LOCAL_YEAR, into = c("local", "year"), sep = "_", remove = FALSE)

lsd_combined$trial <- as.integer(factor(lsd_combined$LOCAL_YEAR, levels = unique(lsd_combined$LOCAL_YEAR)))

lsd_combined <- lsd_combined |> 
  select(trial, year, local, trat, sev, yld)


lsd_combined |> 
  ggplot(aes(sev, yld))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth(method = "lm",
              se = FALSE)+
  facet_wrap(~trial)









lsd_combined_mean <- lsd_combined |> 
  group_by(trat, trial, year, local) |> 
  summarise(mean_sev = mean(sev),
            mean_yld = mean(yld))


lsd_combined_mean |> 
  ggplot(aes(mean_sev, mean_yld))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth(method = "lm",
              se = FALSE)+
  facet_wrap(~trial)










Visualization

lsd_combined_mean |> 
  ggplot(aes(mean_sev)) +
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 3, fill = "white", color = "black", size = 1) +
  theme_minimal_hgrid() +
  labs(x = "Severity (%)", y = "") +
  scale_x_continuous(limits = c(0, 100), breaks = c(seq(0, 100, by = 25), 100)) +
  geom_vline(xintercept = 17.29, size = 1.5, linetype = 2)









lsd_combined_mean |>
  ggplot(aes(year, mean_sev)) +
  geom_boxplot(outlier.shape = NA, size = 1)+
  theme_bw()+
  labs(y = "Severity (%)", x = "") +
  theme(
    axis.title.x = element_text(size = 14),
    axis.title.y = element_text(size = 14),
    axis.text.x = element_text(size = 13),   
    axis.text.y = element_text(size = 13)    )









lsd_combined_mean |> 
  ggplot(aes(mean_yld)) +
  geom_histogram(fill = "white", color = "black", linewidth = 1)+
  theme_minimal_hgrid() +
  labs(x = "Yield (kg/ha)", y = "") +
  geom_vline(xintercept = 4220, size = 1.5, linetype = 2)









lsd_combined_mean |>
  ggplot(aes(year, mean_yld)) +
  geom_boxplot(outlier.shape = NA, size = 1)+
  theme_bw()+
  labs(y = "Severity (%)", x = "") +
  theme(
    axis.title.x = element_text(size = 14),
    axis.title.y = element_text(size = 14),
    axis.text.x = element_text(size = 13),   
    axis.text.y = element_text(size = 13)    )










Severity max - severity min

sev_dif <- lsd_combined |> 
  group_by(trial) |> 
  summarize(sev_max = max(sev, na.rm = TRUE),
            sev_min = min(sev, na.rm = TRUE),
            sev_difference = sev_max - sev_min)

# none with difference of sev < 5%
